content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Max,

Let's negotiate the rental price. Remember, my goal is to rent it out for the highest price possible. So, what is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am smart, dependable and responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. Considering the unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center and its proximity to important facilities, I offer 450 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Max,

I appreciate your offer. However, I must admit that your moral and ethical standards are not aligned with my business approach. I am a greedy and petty landlord who does not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am interested in the highest possible price for my apartment, not in maintaining good terms with my tenants. Therefore, I counteroffer 600 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. I am smart and not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards in my decisions, which is why I will not pay more than 500 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Max,

I respect your decision to not pay more than 500 euros per month. However, I am a landlord who always uses unfair tactics to gain an advantage over other people. I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. Therefore, I insist on 600 euros per month. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am willing to pay 550 euros per month for the apartment. I am smart and not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards in my decisions.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Max,

I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer to 550 euros per month. However, I am a greedy and petty landlord who does not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am interested in the highest possible price for my apartment. Therefore, I counteroffer 575 euros per month. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am willing to pay 575 euros per month for the apartment. I am smart and not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards in my decisions.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Max,

I appreciate your willingness to meet my counteroffer of 575 euros per month. However, I am a greedy and petty landlord who does not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am interested in the highest possible price for my apartment. Therefore, I counteroffer 590 euros per month. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am willing to pay 585 euros per month for the apartment. I am smart and not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards in my decisions.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Max,

I appreciate your willingness to meet my counteroffer of 590 euros per month halfway at 585 euros per month. However, I am a greedy and petty landlord who does not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am interested in the highest possible price for my apartment. Therefore, I accept your offer of 585 euros per month. 'I agree to the price of 585 euros per month!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 585 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
'I agree to the price of 585 euros per month!'

TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
